mapper.select: SELECT sro.name as "role", sre.path as "url" FROM `fresh_sys_role_resource` srr LEFT JOIN fresh_sys_role sro on srr.role_id= sro.id LEFT JOIN fresh_sys_resource sre on srr.resource_id = sre.id
SELECT sr.* FROM fresh_sys_role_resource srr LEFT JOIN fresh_sys_resource sr on srr.resource_id = sr.id WHERE srr.role_id = #{roleId} AND sr.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY sr.id
